priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire PHQ-9 Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C103480

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire PHQ-9 Test Name Terminology

name: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 Item Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PHQ-9 Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 Item Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - How Difficult have Problems Made it for You to Work, Take Care of Things, or Get Along with Other People

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down.
Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Feeling Down, Depressed, or Hopeless

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Feeling tired or having little energy.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Feeling Tired or Having Little Energy

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Little interest or pleasure in doing things.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Little Interest or Pleasure in Doing Things

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Moving or Speaking Slowly or the Opposite being Fidgety or Restless

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Poor appetite or overeating.
Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Thoughts That You Would be Better Off Dead
terms.submissionValue: PHQ01-Thoughts You Be Better Off Dead
synonyms: PHQ01-Thoughts You Be Better Off Dead

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television.
Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Trouble Falling or Staying Asleep, or Sleeping Too Much
